title: Templates
comment_description: This is the root note that will hold all templates.

title: Simple ToDos
comment_description: Simple markdown-powered todo list rendered with an HTML note.

title: Advanced ToDos
comment_description: A more advanced todo list that uses individual notes, and their labels to render an HTML note.

title: NOTD
comment_description: A note that will automatically update itself with the content of a different note every day, as long as note appear with a certain label.
